name: web-app-creator
title: Web App Creator
description: Create standalone web applications from any URL with automatic icon fetching
author: imcodingideas

commands.name: create-standalone-web-applications-from-any-url-with-automatic-icon-fetching
commands.title: Create standalone web applications from any URL with automatic icon fetching

commands.name: create-web-app
commands.title: Create Web App
commands.subtitle: Web App Creator
commands.description: Create a standalone macOS application from any website URL

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
